description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Welcome A in the Insight Elementary coursebook, such as "Kenya", "interest", "twenty-six", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosakata dari Welcome A in the Insight Elementary Course, seperti "Kenya", "Interest", "Twenty-Six", dll.
